column4: anyone know why apache2 won't render php?  i.e. when i go to a php page it offers to download the file instead of interpretting  the code.  I have libapache2-mod-php5 installed as well as php5
I've been searching google for hours and can't get the php to display
anyone know why apache2 won't render php?  i.e. when i go to a php page it offers to download the file instead of interpretting  the code.  I have libapache2-mod-php5 installed as well as php5
do you have mysql and apache installed ?
